content:
Since rustdoc benchmarks seem to be always using "full" runs, should the summary posted by the timer bot sometimes mention the profile instead ?

E.g https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/pull/90913#issuecomment-969212738 has this summary item: "Very large improvement in instruction counts (up to -58.1% on full builds of diesel)", and the perf results show that the benchmark + profile is "diesel doc"
(I'd also like the summary page to show doc runs but I haven't had time to work on that)
